goal.name: jini:deploy
goal.description: Deploys a jar file into the HTTP daemon code base folder

goal.name: jini:genapp
goal.description: Generates a Jini-aware project tree based on a template

goal.name: jini:home
goal.description: Sets the Jini home directory based on the download into your local Maven cache

goal.name: jini:httpd
goal.description: Start the HTTP Daemon

goal.name: jini:start
goal.description: The low level Java runtime for starting services using the start.jar from Jini starter kit

goal.name: jini:start-browser-jeri
goal.description: Start the Browser in JERI

goal.name: jini:start-browser-jrmp
goal.description: Start the Browser in JRMP

goal.name: jini:start-browser-jsse
goal.description: Start the Browser in JSSE
